xml:
Qutenza<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Peripheral neuropathic pain in non-diabetic patients (under the supervision of a physician)

To the skin

  • Adult

    (consult product literature).

 National funding/access decisions

Scottish Medicines Consortium (SMC) Decisions

The Scottish Medicines Consortium has advised (January 2011) that capsaicin 179 mg (8%) patch (Qutenza ) is accepted for restricted use within NHS Scotland for the treatment of postherpetic neuralgia in patients who have not achieved adequate pain relief from, or who have not tolerated conventional first and second line treatments. Treatment should be under the supervision of a specialist in pain management.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
